name: Strawberry Party printable pack
description: Price in $AUD Convert to $USD here. by Lisa Tilse (the red thread) for modernprintables.com This product is a .pdf pack (not a printed product). Once payment is confirmed, the .pdf will be emailed to your paypal account email address. Please allow up to 12 hours for email delivery. Options: 1. Full pack (7 items) 2. Invite only (1 item) This gorgeous strawberry-themed birthday party collection includes editable birthday invitations, thank you notes, bunting, cupcake wrappers, gift tags, tented place cards or food cards and round food toppers or garlands. Make a simple strawberry-festooned birthday cake and cupcakes to compliment the theme. Check out this real strawberry birthday party for lots of ideas. Editable Invitations 4 x editable invitations per A4 page. Instructions: Open the .pdf file in Adobe Reader (download here for free). Enter your child's details in the text fields. You can enter once, then copy and paste into the remaining fields. Print out and trim to size. (You will not be able to edit the other elements of the invitation). Bunting Banners 3 x bunting banners (3 styles) per A4 page. Instructions: Print, cut out banners, hole punch the corners, add your own ribbon, string or bakers twine, and hang. Tented Placecards 4 x tented placecards for food or place setting per A4 page. Instructions: Print, cut out placecards, fold in half and add your text with a pen or marker. Thank You Cards 4 x thank you cards per A4 page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out Thank You cards and add your own message using pen or a marker. Round Toppers 16 x round toppers (4 styles) per A4 page. Instructions: Print on paper or card stock. Cut out toppers using scissors or a 2" hole punch. For food toppers, glue or tape two circles together with a toothpick sandwiched between them. For garlands, tape two circles together either side of string, baker's twine or ribbon at intervals. For envelope seals, simply glue to envelope. Cupcake Wrappers 3 x cupcake wrappers per A4 page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out wrappers, secure wrappers closed using tape on the inside, and glue or double sided tape where the card overlaps. Gift Tags 8 x gift tags per A4 page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out gift tags, hole punch the corner or edge of the tag, add your own ribbon, string or bakers twine, and fix to a favour or gift. Alternatively, staple, or fix using tape, paperclip or other means directly to a gift bag. (c) 2011 Lisa Tilse (the red thread) for modernprintables.com IMPORTANT This product and any element, graphic or illustration from this product may be used for non-commercial purposes only. By purchasing this product, you agree to adhere to the Limited License to Download and Use the Artwork(s). Read the license terms and conditions here. Photography: Milk & Honey Photography and Steph Bond-Hutkin.

name: Babushka Party Printable Pack
description: Price in $AUD Convert to $USD here. by Jess Walsham from Joyess Designs for modernprintables.com This product is a .pdf pack (not a printed product). Once payment is confirmed, the .pdf will be emailed to your paypal account email address. Please allow up to 12 hours for email delivery. Options: 1. Complete collection (8 items) 2. Editable Invitation only 3. Gift tags only 4. Thank you only 5. Personalisation (recommended for external/online printing as any extra details added to the editable .pdf cannot be saved) This gorgeous nesting Babushka dolls (Matryoshka dolls) theme party is super-sweet and perfect for a girl's birthday party or baby shower. The pack includes all the elements of the Babushka Party including editable invitations, thank you notes, bunting banner flags, thank you gift tags, tented place cards or food cards, cupcake and food toppers or garlands, mini-bunting for the top of a cake or food flags, water bottle and juice labels. Editable Invitations 4 x editable invitations per page. Instructions: Open the .pdf file in Adobe Reader (download here for free). Enter the party details in the text fields. Print out and trim to size. You will not be able to edit the other elements of the invitation. You can then print on the printer connected to your computer. If you need to print at a print shop or online, we recommend personalisation NOTE: Once you have edited the fields, you cannot save any changes. The file saves with blank fields. Therefore, if you are printing online or at a print shop, we recommend the personalisation option - a non-editable .pdf will be sent to you with all the details of the party, personalised by our designer. Thank You Cards 4 x thank you cards per page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out Thank You cards and add your own message using pen or a marker. Bunting Banner Flags 3 x bunting banner flags (3 styles) per page. Instructions: Print, cut out banners, hole punch the corners, add your own ribbon, string or bakers twine, and hang. Tented Placecards 4 x tented placecards for food or place settings per page. Instructions: Print, cut out placecards, fold in half and add your text with a pen or marker. Round Toppers 15 x round toppers (4 styles) per page. Instructions: Print on paper or card stock. Cut out toppers using scissors or a 2" hole punch. For food toppers, glue or tape two circles together with a toothpick sandwiched between them. For garlands, tape two circles together either side of string, baker's twine or ribbon at intervals. For envelope seals, simply glue to envelope. Gift Tags 8 x Babushka-shaped gift tags. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out gift tags, add child's name and fix to a favour or gift bag. Juice and Water Bottle Labels 2 x juice labels 2 x water bottle labels Instructions: Print on paper, cut out and glue or use double sided tape to fix to drink bottles. Mini Bunting/Food Flags 20 x mini flags (6 different designs). Instructions: For bunting, print on paper, cut out, fold in half over string and glue together. For food flags, insert a toothpick before gluing. (c) 2011 Jess Walsham (Joyess Images) for modernprintables.com IMPORTANT This product and any element, graphic or illustration from this product may be used for non-commercial purposes only. By purchasing this product, you agree to adhere to the Limited License to Download and Use the Artwork(s). Read the license terms and conditions here.

name: Little Man Party printable pack
description:
Price in $AUD Convert to $USD here. by Jess Walsham from Joyess Designs for modernprintables.com This product is a .pdf pack (not a printed product). Once payment is confirmed, the .pdf will be emailed to your paypal account email address. Please allow up to 12 hours for email delivery. Options: 1. Complete pack (12 elements) 2. Invitation only 3. Photo booth props only 4. Personalisation (recommended for print shops/online printing)

The great colour combination of this yellow and black boy's party is fun and sophisticated at the same time. The pack includes editable birthday invitations, thank you notes, bunting banner, gift tags, tented place cards or food cards, cupcake and food toppers or garlands, photo booth sign and props, mini-bunting for the top of a cake or food flags, water, juice and popcorn labels.. Check out this real Little Man birthday party for lots of ideas. Editable Invitations 4 x editable invitations (approx 4" x 6") per A4 page. Instructions: Open the .pdf file in Adobe Reader (download here for free). Enter your child's details in the text fields. Print out and trim to size. The blue areas seen in the invitation image indicate the editable fields and will be white when printed. You will not be able to edit the other elements of the invitation. You can then print on the printer connected to your computer. If you need to print at a print shop or online, we recommend personalisation NOTE: Once you have edited the fields, you cannot save any changes. The file saves with blank fields. Therefore, if you are printing online or at a print shop, we recommend the personalisation option - a non-editable .pdf will be sent to you with all the details of the party, personalised by our designer. Thank You Cards 4 x thank you cards per A4 page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out Thank You cards and add your own message using pen or a marker. Bunting Banners 3 x bunting banners (3 styles) per A4 page. Instructions: Print, cut out banners, hole punch the corners, add your own ribbon, string or bakers twine, and hang. Tented Placecards 4 x tented placecards for food or place setting per A4 page. Instructions: Print, cut out placecards, fold in half and add your text with a pen or marker. Round Toppers 15 x round toppers (5 styles) per A4 page. Instructions: Print on paper or card stock. Cut out toppers using scissors or a 2" hole punch. For food toppers, glue or tape two circles together with a toothpick sandwiched between them. For garlands, tape two circles together either side of string, baker's twine or ribbon at intervals. For envelope seals, simply glue to envelope. Gift Tags 6 x tie-shaped gift tags. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out gift tags, add child's name and fix to a favour or gift bag. Popcorn Labels 6 x popcorn labels. Instructions: Print on paper, cut out and glue or use double sided tape to fix to a popcorn box. Juice and Water Bottle Labels 2 x juice labels. 2 x water bottle labels Instructions: Print on paper, cut out and glue or use double sided tape to fix to drink bottles. Mini Bunting/Food Flags 10 x mini flags (6 different designs). Instructions: For bunting, print on paper, cut out, fold in half over string and glue together. For food flags, insert a toothpick before gluing. Photo Booth Sign 1 x photo booth sign. Instructions: Print on paper or card stock, cut out and insert into a picture frame to display next to photo booth props. Photo Booth Props 1 x bowler hat template. 4 x mustache templates (2 sizes). Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out and tape to a straw or stick. Hand out to people to use while having their photo taken. (c) 2011 Jess Walsham (Joyess Images) for modernprintables.com IMPORTANT This product and any element, graphic or illustration from this product may be used for non-commercial purposes only. By purchasing this product, you agree to adhere to the Limited License to Download and Use the Artwork(s). Read the license terms and conditions here. Photography: Joyess Images.

name: Elephant Party Printable Pack (personalised invite)
description: Price in $AUD Convert to $USD here. by Jess Walsham from Joyess Designs for modernprintables.com This product is a .pdf pack containing 9 elements (not a printed product) This sweet Elephant and Balloon theme party is perfect for both a young girl's birthday party or boy's birthday party, christening, naming ceremony, or a baby shower. The pack includes all the elements of the Elephant Party including invitations, thank you notes, bunting banner flags, thank you gift tags, tented place cards or food cards, round toppers (for topping cupcake and food or for use as a garland), mini-bunting flags (for the top of a cake or food flags), water bottle and juice bottle labels and five patterned pages. Personalised Invitations 2 sizes - A5 and A6 4 x 4x6 invitations per page. 2 x 5x7 invitations per page. Instructions: Once your order has been processed, we will be in touch to get your invitation details and the invite will be personalised for you. Thank You Cards 4 x thank you cards per page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out Thank You cards and add your own message using pen or a marker. Bunting Banner Flags 3 x bunting banner flags (3 styles) per page. Instructions: Print, cut out banners, hole punch the corners, add your own ribbon, string or bakers twine, and hang. Tented Placecards 4 x tented placecards for food or place settings per page. 2 designs - elephant and balloon. Instructions: Print, cut out placecards, fold in half and add your text with a pen or marker. Round Toppers 15 x round toppers (5 styles) per page. Instructions: Print on paper or card stock. Cut out toppers using scissors or a 2" hole punch. For food toppers, glue or tape two circles together with a toothpick sandwiched between them. For garlands, tape two circles together either side of string, baker's twine or ribbon at intervals. For envelope seals, simply glue to envelope. Gift Tags 6 x balloon and elephant-shaped gift tags per A4 page. Instructions: Print on card stock, cut out gift tags, add child's name and fix to a favour or gift bag. Juice and Water Bottle Labels 2 x juice labels 2 x water bottle labels Instructions: Print on paper, cut out and glue or use double sided tape to fix to drink bottles. Mini Bunting/Food Flags 20 x mini flags (4 different designs). Instructions: For bunting, print on paper, cut out, fold in half over string and glue together. For food flags, insert a toothpick before gluing. Patterned Paper 5 x patterned A4 pages. Instructions: Patterned pages are provided for your own use. You could use to cut out more bunting flags as spacers, a paper chain garland, a lantern, or any other paper craft needs for your party.
